Myelin Foundry is a deep tech product start-up that transforms human experiences and industry outcomes by building Artificial Intelligence algorithms on video, voice, and sensor data, for edge devices.

At Myelin Foundry I worked on :
June 2022 - Aug 2020

  • Creating novel new architectures and training pipelines to create higher detail SR outputs.
  • Created an end-to-end enhanced data loader pipeline in tf.data to enable rapid prototyping
  • Co-ordinating the comapny hackathon in partnership with NASSCOM
  • Tested out deep learning based audio enhancements for improved user experiences

July 2019 - June 2019

  • Tested & evaluated the viability of Tensorflow.js for the deployment of the organizations product stack

Samsung Research Institute

Chennai, India

  • Samsung PRISM Researcher
    Aug 2020 - November 2019

Certificate of Excellence

Tensorflow Bezier Curves BERT NLTK

Samsung is a South Korean multinational conglomerate headquartered in Samsung Town, Seoul. It comprises numerous affiliated businesses, most of them united under the Samsung brand, and is the largest South Korean chaebol.

As part of a team of student researcher under the Samsung PRISM program, I worked on:

  • Online Handwritting Recognition in Bengali and Tamil.
  • The dataset was collected by us on campus and comprised of 1300 Handwritting samples.
  • The data was in the form of XML Files with (x,y,t) information.
  • The model we chose to use was an attention based LSTM to learn more information.
  • This model was combined with a pre-trained language model - BERT to improve the accuracy of our predictions.

Internship Letter

Tensorflow Docker OpenCV

Tata Elxsi is amongst the world’s leading providers of design and technology services across industries including Automotive, Broadcast, Communications and Healthcare.

As an intern for Tata Elxsi, I was tasked with :

  • Creating an API to perform object detection in identifying humans from video footage and estimating their distance.
  • One of the many proposed applications for the API was to enforce Social Distancing protocols to assist clients better ensure safe working conditions.
  • The API was packaged into a Docker container to maintain stability and ease of sharing.

Labs / Student Organizations

MPS-LAB

Tempe, AZ , USA

  • Masters Student Researcher
    Jan 2023 - Present

The mission of Make Programming Simple Lab is to investigate novel architectural, compiler, runtime, and system operation mechanisms to make the task of programming these ambitious applications easier on complex, distributed, and heterogeneous computing platforms.

  • Submitted a paper to Design and Automation Conference, 2024 titled QPMeL(Quantum polar Metric Learning).
  • Researching a new approach to Physics Informed Neural Networks (PINNs) used for system identification based on TinyML models for more lightweight and efficient models.
  • Founded the Quantum-Machine Learning research vertical.
  • Built a wavelet-convolution layer for the TinyML contest, ICCAD 2023.

ASSOCIATION OF COMPUTING MACHINERY

Chennai, India

  • Vice Chairperson: Student Chapter
    Jan 2020 - Jan 2019

  • Secretary, Student Chapter
    Jan 2019 – Jan 2018

Certificate of Service

The Association for Computing Machinery is a US-based international learned society for computing. It is the world's largest scientific and educational computing society. The ACM is a non-profit professional membership group, claiming nearly 100,000 student and professional members as of 2019

As Vice Chairperson of our college's ACM Student Chapter, I am incharge of conducting interviews for new recruits , managing events. I am tasked administrative duties such as : approval of equipment, managing partnerships with other organizations, approving events & get sponsorships.

I served as the secretary here till Jan 2020. My work here was acknowledged by ACM Global and I was sent a letter of appreciation. Under my term, our team grew from 18 people to 250 people. The growth was accompanied by a growth in our number of events.
